item.title: Descriptive statistics by hand
item.description: Introduction Location versus dispersion measures Location Minimum and maximum Mean Median Mean vs. median Dispersion Range Introduction This article explains how to compute the main descriptive statistics by hand. To learn how to compute these measures in R, read “Descriptive statistics in R”. Descriptive statistics (in the broad sense of the term) is a branch of statistics aiming at summarizing and describing a series of values or a dataset.
